action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the pillow in the freezer, the broom on the bed and the plate on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a living room here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a living room here.
You are in a broom closet now. There are a mop and a broom. The mop is on the floor. The broom is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the broom. In your inventory you have a broom and a plate.
You can't go to a living room from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a living room here.
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a side table, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.
You are in a bedroom now. There are a table, a bed and a wardrobe. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a living room here.
You put the broom on the bed.
You can't go to a hallway from here.
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a side table, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.

> go to hallway
> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a living room here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
The freezer is now open. The freezer is empty.

> go to kitchen
> go to hallway
> go to living room
> go to bedroom
> put plate on table
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.

> drop plate
> go to pantry
> go to kitchen
> go to hallway
> go to living room
> go to bedroom
> take plate
> put plate on table
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is open. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.

> go to kitchen
> go to living room
> go to bedroom
> put plate on table
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.

> go to hallway
> go to living room
> go to bedroom
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a living room here.

> go to living room
> go to bedroom
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a side table, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.

> go to bedroom
> put plate on table
You are in a bedroom now. There are a broom, a table, a bed and a wardrobe. The broom is on the bed. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a living room here.
You put the plate on the table.

> go to living room
> go to hallway
> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a side table, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.

> go to hallway
> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a living room here.

> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is open. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.

> go to kitchen
> go to hallway
> go to broom closet
> drop broom
> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
> take pillow from freezer
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.

> go to pantry
> put pillow in freezer
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is open. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You can't see a pillow here.

> go to hallway
> go to broom closet
You can't go to a hallway from here.

> go to kitchen
> go to hallway
> go to broom closet
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.

> go to hallway
> go to broom closet
> take pillow
> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
> put pillow in freezer
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a living room here.

> go to broom closet
> take pillow
You are in a broom closet now. There is a mop. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
I don't see a pillow here.
